title: Ticket #3192: Brain dump: Scot Kronenfeld
description:
Release Tasks
1: Releasing bits to the web
1: Build and test dashboard (php) (Todd Miller) (Andrew Broman)
1: Per-commit builds (Todd Miller and Greg Thain)
1: Parallel Tests - work to date (Todd Miller wrt BaTLab functionality and Gthain)

1: Download pages (potential future BaTLab/SWAMP capability) (Alan De Smet for statistics, Zach or TJ for download scripts)

1: General NMI/Condor integration (Flightworthy with BaTLab support as in the past)
1: Help Michael Hanke get his Debian-style package upstream (this was an action item, not a braindump, but Jaime and Tim have worked with Michael in the past and will continue to do so. Michael is aware of who to contact)

Note that I wrote a lot of documentation at ContinuousBuildAndTestsInNmi

Other

    1: Gittrac task tracking (Todd T)
remarks:
2012-Aug-23 15:21:46 by tannenba:
All brain dump tasks crossed off should have either a name of the person who received the wisdom from Scot (and is therefore taking over responsibility for this item), or a Wiki page link. Currently some crossed off tasks have neither, e.g. Download pages, Debian, ...
